question: Format answer for: Regarding patient 'CII-3' from family 'Family C': What is the standardized alias for the third mutation?
context:
Based *only* on the information contained within the provided document:

The document states on page 3, in the first paragraph of the right column: "Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35." Patient CII-3 from Family C is one of the patients identified with the p.D620N mutation (as shown in Table 1 and Figure 1C).

Therefore, according to this document, patient CII-3 was found to have only the p.D620N mutation in the VPS35 gene, and no other variants (which would include a "second" or "third" mutation) were detected in this patient within the VPS35 gene.

Thus, the information for a "third mutation" for patient CII-3 is not found in the document.

Information not found.
